title: Texas Florida STUNT OFF, Cabin Fever Capitalism 4.19.22
itunes:title: Texas Florida STUNT OFF, Cabin Fever Capitalism 4.19.22
description:
In episode 1229, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian and co-host of Air Buds and Sorry We Love Football, Jamel Johnson to discuss… Greg Abbott’s Racist Political Theater, Florida rejects 54 math books because some had Critical Race Theory in them?, Do We Have National Cabin Fever? ...and more!

  1. Greg Abbott’s Racist Political Theater
  2. Delays, closures and chaos mount at Texas-Mexico border crossings from new state inspections
  3. Texas Gov. Greg Abbott's truck inspection policy created a logjam at the border that resulted in $240 million of spoiled produce
  4. Florida rejects 54 math books because some had Critical Race Theory in them?
  5. Do We Have National Cabin Fever?
  6. The Literature of Cabin Fever

followthrough.studio

LISTEN: Figurine by Wayne Snow

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
